sqlMap.select: select distinct EP_SNO from EP_Package where bg_sStatus=1
select * from ep_project where EP_SNO in ($id$)
select * from EP_Package where bg_sStatus=1 and EP_SNO=#id#
select * from ep_process where ep_sNo=#EP_SNO# and bg_sNo=#BG_SNO# and ss_sState=#SS_SSTATE#

select BG_SNO, EP_SNO, BG_STYPE, BG_SNAME, BG_NPURTYPE, BG_NPURSTYPE, BG_NMONEYBG, BG_NBAGMONEY, BG_NOVERMONEY, BG_SSTATUS, BG_SSTATUS1, AG_NID, AG_NID1, AG_NID2, BG_SISDEL, BG_SISVALID, BG_SREPLYBY, BG_SREPLYDATE, BG_SALTERBY, BG_SALTERDATE, BG_SDEF1, BG_SDEF2, BG_SDEF3, BG_SDEF4, BG_SDEF5, BG_SDEF6, BG_SDEF7, BG_SDEF8, BG_SDEF9, BG_SDEF10, BG_SDEF11, BG_SDEF12, BG_SDEF13, BG_SDEF14, BG_SDEF15, BG_SDEF16, BG_SDEF17, BG_SDEF18, BG_SDEF19, BG_SDEF20, BG_TDEF1, BG_TDEF2, BG_TDEF3, BG_TDEF4, BG_TDEF5, BG_NDEF1, BG_NDEF2, BG_NDEF3, BG_NDEF4, BG_NDEF5, BG_NDEF6, BG_NDEF7, BG_NDEF8, BG_NDEF9, BG_NDEF10, BG_NDEF11 from EP_PACKAGE
order by $orderByClause$

select BG_SNO, EP_SNO, BG_STYPE, BG_SNAME, BG_NPURTYPE, BG_NPURSTYPE, BG_NMONEYBG, BG_NBAGMONEY, BG_NOVERMONEY, BG_SSTATUS, BG_SSTATUS1, AG_NID, AG_NID1, AG_NID2, BG_SISDEL, BG_SISVALID, BG_SREPLYBY, BG_SREPLYDATE, BG_SALTERBY, BG_SALTERDATE, BG_SDEF1, BG_SDEF2, BG_SDEF3, BG_SDEF4, BG_SDEF5, BG_SDEF6, BG_SDEF7, BG_SDEF8, BG_SDEF9, BG_SDEF10, BG_SDEF11, BG_SDEF12, BG_SDEF13, BG_SDEF14, BG_SDEF15, BG_SDEF16, BG_SDEF17, BG_SDEF18, BG_SDEF19, BG_SDEF20, BG_TDEF1, BG_TDEF2, BG_TDEF3, BG_TDEF4, BG_TDEF5, BG_NDEF1, BG_NDEF2, BG_NDEF3, BG_NDEF4, BG_NDEF5, BG_NDEF6, BG_NDEF7, BG_NDEF8, BG_NDEF9, BG_NDEF10, BG_NDEF11 from EP_PACKAGE where BG_SNO = #BG_SNO:VARCHAR#
